CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function embedYoutubeIframe is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly uses the 'data-ytparams' attribute from the clicked element to construct an iframe without properly sanitizing the input. An attacker could potentially inject malicious scripts through this attribute, which would then be executed when the iframe is loaded.
